article_title: Sorry Folks, Independence Day Is Canceled

article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.

og.description: “Well, Doctor , what have we got—a Republic or a Monarchy?” “A Republic, if you can keep it.” This week's Independence Day celebrations mark quite the contrast with the modern bureaucratic nanny state, with the all-powerful centralized government we actually have. We'll wave flags symbolizing commonality with our nation's founders who [...]
